## Question Details

**Question Text (LaTeX):**
```latex
\text{Coin flipped 9 times, P(heads) = 0.5}
```

**Correct Answer:** \text{Binomial: } B(9, 0.5)

**All Options:**
1. Uniform: U(0, 9)
2. Binomial: B(9, 0.5)
3. Normal: N(9, 0.5)
4. Poisson: Po(9)
5. I don't know
                    (no penalty)
